title: Santa Bard Skin
body: Hey guys, I was thought about this whilst playing him the other day and got embarrassingly excited about it. I mean, bard has a beard and hops around. The speed boost he gets from chimes and health stations could make him get a sled or something. His "meeps" could be small elves that follow him. His health stations could be snowflake shapes. His Q could be a snowball. His ultimate could make a snowdome appear or simply just freeze everyone. Any thoughts?{{champion:432}} {{item:3110}}

replies.body:
